info: Please enter the name of your website or company. This will be used to generate social sharing meta data.
Please enter text to be automatically appended to every meta title value on the website. This could be your company name, location and slogan.
Please enter your Twitter profile link. This will be used for the Twitter social media icon.
Please enter your YouTube link URL. This will be used for the YouTube social media icon.
Please enter your Facebook page link. This will be used for the Facebook social media icon.
Please enter your Vimeo page link. This will be used for the Vimeo social media icon.
Please enter your LinkedIn page link. This will be used for the LinkedIn social media icon.
Please enter your Google+ page link. This will be used for the Google+ social media icon.
Please enter your Pinterest page link. This will be used for the Pinterest social media icon.
Please enter your Pinterest page link. This will be used for the Pinterest social media icon.
